SEARCH

Package io.github.thatgarlicdude.pacio

package io.github.thatgarlicdude.pacio

PacIO is a Java library used for accessing and modifying the Pac-Man ROM set, as well as the ROM files within it.

This is the main package of the library, solely featuring the main class, PacIO. This class can create core objects, such as PacFile and PacDirectory, which are used to modify the ROM files from disk. This was made to ease the accessibility for the library.

In addition to this package, it also features the file package called io.github.thatgarlicdude.pacio.file. That package handles generic file reading and writing, as well as directory opening and saving.
